seo.metaTitle: NWA Daily - A daily newsletter about all things Northwest Arkansas
seo.metaDescription: NWA Daily is a daily email newsletter that keeps readers up to date on the latest Northwest Arkansas news or NWA news in events, restaurants, business,  the community, politics, art, entertainment, culture, and sports in Northwest Arkansas including news about Bentonville, Rogers, Springdale, and Fayetteville

node.description: Live, laugh, pay nothing for attic insulation. See if you qualify for attic insulation and other energy-saving home improvements from SWEPCO’s Home Performance with ENERGY STAR® Pathway—all at no cost to you.
node.Name: SWEPCO

node.description: Ledger offers on-demand access to rent tech-enabled meeting rooms and workspaces in a state of the art building anchored in the heart of Downtown Bentonville. To learn more about shared workspaces click HERE.
node.Name: Ledger

node.description: Emcar Stone Studio is a family owned and operated full service fabrication and installation company servicing NWA that specializes in residential/commercial: quartz, granite, marble, and quartzite countertops. Contact them today for a complimentary quote!
node.Name: Emcar Stone Studio

node.description: Since 1957, Underwoods has been committed to quality and value. Named "Coolest Store in America" by InStore Magazine, and winner of state, national, and international design awards, Underwoods' dedication to craftsmanship and design excellence creates timeless jewelry.
node.Name: Underwoods Fine Jewelers

node.description: Ozark Compost & Swap is on a mission to make sustainable living convenient through doorstep composting and package-free product delivery. Sign up HERE and use discount code NWADAILY to receive a complimentary one-month trial of a bi-weekly pickup
node.Name: Ozark Compost & Swap
node.Location: 1 East Center St Ste #330 Unit #521 Fayetteville, AR 72701

node.description: Beth Bowen Dental Studio is a dental office unlike anything you've experienced. Their patients receive personalized, compassionate care from one of the most highly-skilled dentists in the area. They prioritize listening to and caring for their patients. Learn more here.
node.Name: Beth Bowen Dental Studio

node.description: Designer Remodeling Service specializing in Kitchens and Baths. OZKB offers complete remodeling services from start to finish resulting in an unforgettably phenomenal home improvement experience. Serving Northwest Arkansas.
node.Name: Ozark Kitchens
